title: List of all Android support  gradle libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android support  gradle libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: photofilter
repoList.description: A simple easy to use library that lets you edit pictures on the fly with easy. Photo filter lets you apply a large number of filters all while maintaining maximum image quality. Supports Android 2.3 and higher.

repoList.name: can-i-drop-jetifier
repoList.description: Gradle plugin that checks if there are dependencies using support library instead of AndroidX.

repoList.name: android-quick-setup
repoList.description: Android base project that already setup Gradle, Dagger, Otto, Retrofit, Support Libraries, Junit support for AndroidStudio, Mockito and Robolectric

repoList.name: gradle-publish-plugin
repoList.description: Gradle plugin that supported publish all of your Java, Kotlin or Android libraries to any Maven Repository.

repoList.name: customFloatingActionButton
repoList.description: This view is for replacement of standard Floating Action Button from Google Support Library. It is easy to use, customizable and you can also add text to button

repoList.name: ReusableAndroidUtils
repoList.description: A small collection of reusable utilities for Android, packaged as an Android Library with Gradle support.

repoList.name: android-cd-travis-example
repoList.description: This is a CD example with an Android application using gradle, Robospice, Instrumentation, Support Library v4 and v7, Travis and TestFlight.

repoList.name: FaRequest
repoList.description: Request support cache, rxjava, custome request adapter with other Httprequest library

repoList.name: log4k
repoList.description: Lightweight logging library for Kotlin/Multiplatform. Supports Android, iOS, JavaScript and plain JVM environments.

repoList.name: threadsample
repoList.description: Android ThreadSample updated to work with Android Studio 4.0.0, Gradle 6.1.1, Flickr and modern support libraries
